page.title: 02A Village Family
page.content: Dad has to get up at seven o'clock. He goes to work at 7.30a.m. He is a farm worker. He drives a John Deere and doew all the baling, fertilizing, spraying, hedge cutting, fencing and ditching. He works until 5 o'clock. At harvest time he works until 9 or 10 o'clock at night. Mum gets up to make Dad's breakfast and prepare his lunch. Then she gets my brother and I ready for school. She makes our breakfast. I have Weetabix. She gives us a wash and takes us to school. At half past eleven Mum comes to school to work in the kitchen and get the dinners ready. Mum does all the washing and ironing. Sometimes when my Dad is working late I help to cut the lawns and do the gardening.
